title: Modi positions India as AI leader at India AI Impact Summit
desc: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has pitched India as a major hub for artificial intelligence, built at home and used worldwide.

title: Defence players post steady Q3 earnings amid strong execution; valuations remain elevated in select names
desc: Analysts noted that overall, the quarter was healthy for most defence players, barring select names such as Bharat Dynamics Limited.

title: Group backs out after Trump won't invite all governors to the White House
desc: The National Governors Association is pulling out of an annual meeting at the White House after President Donald Trump declined to invite two Democratic governors.

title: MPs clash in Parliament over killing of Ghanaian traders in Burkina Faso
desc: Members of Parliament on Thursday, February 19, 2026, engaged in a heated debate on the floor of the House following reports of an attack on Ghanaian traders in Burkina Faso that left eight people dead.

title: Grey's Anatomy's Eric Dane dies aged 53 after ALS battle
desc: Grey's Anatomy and Euphoria star Eric Dane has died aged 53 following a battle with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS).

title: MAHA Moms Turn Against Trump: ‘Women Feel Like They Were Lied To’
desc: President Trump’s executive order aimed at spurring production of a pesticide has infuriated leaders of Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s MAHA movement.

title: Eric Dane: Grey's Anatomy and Euphoria star dies aged 53
desc: Described as "determined to make a difference for others" with ALS disease, his representatives said he would be "lovingly remembered" and "deeply missed".

title: Director MM Baig, who helped Hrithik Roshan with diction, found dead at Mumbai home
desc: Hindi film director MM Baig, father of former child actor Baby Guddu, was found dead at his residence earlier this week. He helped Hrithik Roshan with his diction and voice modulation before the actor's debut.

title: Cook Government set to progress Cat Amendment Bill which could see curfews, restrictions across Perth
desc: Local governments will be able to implement laws around restricting cats to their owners’ premises, prohibiting cats from all public areas, or introducing cat curfews.

title: Record-breaking broadcast deal likely in Pakistan history
desc: A franchise is considering ₨4.5 billion annually for PSL broadcast rights
